hero.tagline: Building beautiful, performant mobile and web applications with Flutter

bio.description1: A passionate Flutter developer with 3+ years of experience building beautiful, performant mobile and web applications. I specialize in creating user-centric solutions that combine clean code, modern design, and cutting-edge technology.
bio.description2: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.

senior.title: Senior Flutter Developer
senior.description: Led development of multiple Flutter applications, mentored junior developers, and implemented CI/CD pipelines.

mobile.title: Mobile App Developer
mobile.description: Developed cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter, integrated with REST APIs and implemented state management.

junior.title: Junior Developer
junior.description: Started my journey in mobile development, learned Flutter fundamentals and contributed to various client projects.

cs.title: Bachelor of Computer Science
cs.description: Focused on software engineering, mobile development, and user experience design.

certification.title: Flutter Development Certification
certification.description: Advanced Flutter development course covering state management, animations, and app architecture.
